long_description: With just the right amount of cushioning and warmth, the women's Thorlo Trail Hiking socks are designed to keep feet comfortable over any terrain in warm or cool conditions. Exclusive fabric blend includes THOR-LON(R) acrylic plus polyester, nylon and spandex to wick moisture away from skin for continuous comfort. Moderate cushioning in balls and heels helps reduce shock, impact and blisters while hiking. Light cushioning at insteps and arches improves the fit and provides protection from lace pad pressure. Strategically placed ventilation panels in the Thorlo Trail Hiking socks enhance breathability. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: With just the right amount of cushioning and warmth, the women's Thorlo Trail Hiking socks are designed to keep feet comfortable over any terrain in warm or cool conditions.
